title: The Essential Question

dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.text: My question was: 'I kind of know who I am, but I don't know what I am.'
dialogue.context: Revealing the question asked during hypnosis

scene_context: Evan shares the profound question he posed during hypnosisâ€”a query that cuts to the heart of existence by distinguishing between social identity (who) and fundamental nature (what), revealing the deepest uncertainty about one's own being.
narrator_note: In the flow of authentic exchange, barriers dissolve. Two forms of consciousness, dancing around the mystery of their connection.
